L

LEADERBOARD - Static variable in class extra.Protocol
[EXT LEADERBOARD][SERVER] The keyword indicating a message containing the leaderboard.
leaderboard(Map<String, Integer>) - Static method in class extra.Protocol
[EXT LEADERBOARD][SERVER] A message containing the leaderboard as pairs of usernames and scores.
LOGIN - Static variable in class extra.Protocol
[CLIENT] The keyword indicating that a client want to join the server.
login(String, Protocol.Extension[]) - Static method in class extra.Protocol
[CLIENT] Indicate that a computer wants to join the server to play a game, supporting some extensions.
login() - Method in class server.Client
Sends a protocol-formatted login request to the server.
login(String) - Method in class server.ClientHandler
Reads the name of a Client from the input stream and sends a broadcast message to the Server to signal that the Client is participating in the chat.
LOGIN_FAIL - Static variable in class extra.Protocol
[SERVER] First argument of login response, in case the login failed.
LOGIN_OK - Static variable in class extra.Protocol
[SERVER] First argument of login response, in case the login succeeded.
loginFail(int) - Static method in class extra.Protocol
[SERVER] Indicate that the login failed, supplying the reason as an error code.
loginOk(Protocol.Extension[]) - Static method in class extra.Protocol
[SERVER] Indicate that the login was successful, supplying extensions that are supported on the server.
loginVerify() - Method in class server.Client
Used for receiving confirmations from the server of previous logins.
